name: Spaceship
description:
This was the final project for my Virtual Environments class I took in Fall 2014. I wanted the art style to be reminiscent of the game Mirror's Edge, with a simple art style with a single vibrant color tone. My favorite part of this environment is some of the technical achievements I made in the doors and the floating chairs and beds, along with the bouncing cubes in the generator.

There are also some screenshots of the Space Ship environment, showcasing the main areas of the environment.

*Note: All textures are from Textures.com, and all sounds are from FreeSound.org.

Year of production: Fall 2014
